title: Used to be "bright ideas"
content:
I have an old catalog from 1995 that features some fonts available from "bright ideas".   
   
This was a subscription service where a disc was sent once a month containing various software clip art and fonts. The number provided is no longer in service. Anyone know if this company was bought out?   
   
Some fonts in this catalog are "tamarin", "patton", "pinhead", "sapporo". Ring a bell?
author: anneg

comments.content:
They did have a URL : bideas.com   
   
This has now gone but is still registered to a Daniel Shamoon ( email [danielshamoon@yahoo.com](mailto:danielshamoon@yahoo.com) )

What is still viewable of the site can be found in the Internet Archive.   
   
 [http://web.archive.org/web/20000621023016/http://www.bideas.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20051111102000/http:/web.archive.org/web/20000621023016/http:/www.bideas.com/)   
   
g.

Bright Ideas is published in Carlsbad, California, by SOMC Group Inc.
